statements: SELECT * FROM loyalty_program;
SELECT customer_name, total_purchases FROM loyalty_program WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, last_purchase_date FROM loyalty_program WHERE total_purchases > 1000;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_program ORDER BY last_purchase_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM loyalty_program WHERE last_purchase_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM loyalty_program ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, total_purchases FROM loyalty_program WHERE total_purchases > 1000 ORDER BY total_purchases DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, last_purchase_date FROM loyalty_program WHERE last_purchase_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, total_purchases FROM loyalty_program WHERE total_purchases <= 500 AND last_purchase_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, total_purchases, last_purchase_date FROM loyalty_program WHERE customer_name LIKE '%John%' ORDER BY total_purchases ASC;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_program;
SELECT program_name, start_date, end_date FROM loyalty_program;
SELECT loyalty_program_id, program_name FROM loyalty_program ORDER BY program_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM purchase_history WHERE purchase_amount > 100;
SELECT customer_id, purchase_amount, purchase_date FROM purchase_history WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_program;
SELECT program_name, start_date, end_date FROM loyalty_program ORDER BY program_name DESC;
SELECT loyalty_program_id, program_name FROM loyalty_program WHERE start_date <= '2022-01-01';
SELECT loyalty_program_id, program_name, start_date, end_date FROM loyalty_program WHERE program_name LIKE '%VIP%' ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_purchases, SUM(purchase_amount) AS total_spent FROM purchase_history WHERE purchase_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_program;
SELECT program_name, start_date, end_date FROM loyalty_program;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM customer;
SELECT * FROM purchase_history WHERE total_amount > 100;
SELECT customer_id, purchase_date, total_amount FROM purchase_history ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT program_name, start_date, end_date FROM loyalty_program;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM customer WHERE customer_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM purchase_history ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT program_name, COUNT(*) AS total_customers FROM loyalty_program JOIN customer ON loyalty_program.program_id = customer.customer_id GROUP BY program_name;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_program UNION SELECT * FROM customer UNION SELECT * FROM purchase_history;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email FROM customers ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, name, loyalty_points FROM customers WHERE loyalty_points >= 100 ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, name, email, loyalty_points FROM customers WHERE name LIKE 'A%' OR name LIKE 'J%' LIMIT 5;

SELECT c.name AS customer_name, lp.program_name AS loyalty_program FROM customers c JOIN customer_loyalty cl ON c.customer_id = cl.customer_id JOIN loyalty_programs lp ON cl.program_id = lp.program_id;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY name ASC, loyalty_points DESC;
SELECT customer_id, name, email FROM customers WHERE loyalty_points > 1000 ORDER BY loyalty_points DESC;
SELECT c.name, p.product_name, p.price FROM customers c JOIN purchases p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id WHERE p.purchase_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY c.name, p.price DESC;

SELECT c.name, lp.program_name, lp.discount FROM customers c JOIN customer_loyalty cl ON c.customer_id = cl.customer_id JOIN loyalty_programs lp ON cl.program_id = lp.program_id ORDER BY c.name, lp.discount DESC;
SELECT c.name, SUM(p.price) AS total_spent FROM customers c JOIN purchases p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id GROUP BY c.name HAVING total_spent > 500 ORDER BY total_spent DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT purchase_date, purchase_amount FROM purchases WHERE purchase_amount > 100 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, price, category FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT program_name, discount, benefits FROM loyalty_programs;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT purchase_id, customer_id, purchase_date, purchase_amount FROM purchases WHERE purchase_amount > 1000 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, price, category FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' OR category = 'Clothing' ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_programs WHERE discount >= 10.00;

SELECT customers.customer_name, loyalty_programs.program_name, customer_loyalty.join_date FROM customers JOIN customer_loyalty ON customers.customer_id = customer_loyalty.customer_id JOIN loyalty_programs ON loyalty_programs.program_id = customer_loyalty.program_id ORDER BY customer_loyalty.join_date ASC;
